HMAC Module¶

hmac_utils.py

Provides HMAC generation and verification utilities for message authentication in the secure UDP chat application. Uses HMAC with SHA-256 for ensuring message integrity and authenticity.

Author: Burak Yilmaz

secure_crypto.hmac_utils.generate_hmac(secret_key, message)¶

Generates an HMAC for a given message using a secret key.

Parameters:

  • secret_key (bytes) – The shared secret key used to generate the HMAC.

  • message (str) – The plaintext message to authenticate.

Returns:

The generated HMAC as a hexadecimal string.

Return type:

str

secure_crypto.hmac_utils.verify_hmac(secret_key, message, received_hmac)¶

Verifies that the received HMAC matches the expected HMAC for the message.

Parameters:

  • secret_key (bytes) – The shared secret key used to verify the HMAC.

  • message (str) – The plaintext message that was authenticated.

  • received_hmac (str) – The received HMAC to validate.

Returns:

True if the received HMAC is valid; False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Udp_secure_chat
